description: This file defines a front-end component 'NotesHome' using LightningJS framework. It manages the layout and interactions for the notes application, including listing notes, editing a selected note, and creating new notes. It imports external components, services, and styling themes.

classes.name: NotesHome
classes.description: A LightningJS component serving as the main page for the notes application, managing layout, state, and user interactions.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Handles note selection by updating the selectedId state.

methods.name: newNote
methods.description: Creates a new note and sets it as the selected note.

methods.name: enterHover
methods.description: Changes the button color to indicate hover state.

methods.name: leaveHover
methods.description: Reverts the button color when hover ends.
